Posts.Content: so sorry to hear of your bad reaction Maryl, I did 5FU and Leukovorin for colon cancer and did not have that reaction, how scary. I was dx with bc the following year but refused chemo, did lump and rads. Please e-mail me at --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---if you want to talk.
Posts.Title: 5fu and Dpd Enzyme Deficiency

Posts.Content: I was dx 10/02 with colon cancer and had a port for chemo, was sore and uncomfortable ever since even after removal. I am now 3 months past breast cancer surgery and rads, dx 10/03. My arm and shoulder are so weak and achy I don't know how to stop it, any suggestions?
Posts.Title: Weak Shoulder and Arm
